learning: When Homebrew formula versions are short git SHAs, brew upgrade may not rebuild even after revision bump; use brew reinstall to force pickup.
evidence: homebrew-tap Formula/cas.rb bumped to e96693d; brew upgrade reported already installed; brew reinstall built /opt/homebrew/Cellar/cas/e96693d successfully.
application: In cas release workflow, run brew reinstall after formula SHA bump and verify installed cellar path/version.
